metadata.name: Devil Dealers
metadata.description: The world's greatest card shark. A woman outracing the Devil. A fiddler who'll make the sun come up. A chess player with a master plan. And a bluesman who can bring anyone to tears. They're the best at what they do, and they're going to show the Devil how things are done. Written by Ross May (Tales of the TMNT) and art by Brett Wood (The Silver Bullet).
